thread.title: Hawks' Dwight Howard fakes out Celtics fan who really wanted his jersey
thread.title_full: Hawks' Dwight Howard fakes out Celtics fan who really wanted his jersey

author: Jordan Greer (jgreer@sportingnews.com)
title: Hawks' Dwight Howard fakes out Celtics fan who really wanted his jersey
text:
February 28, 2017 12:35am EST February 28, 2017 12:35am EST Dwight Howard knows a fake fan when he sees one. Hawks center Dwight Howard (Getty Images) 
Updated at 12:35 a.m. ET 
Updated at 12:35 a.m. ET 
Dwight Howard knows a fake fan when he sees one. 
The Hawks center was ejected from Monday night's game against the Celtics after receiving his second technical in the third quarter for hanging on the rimÂ âÂ an ejection the NBA later said never should have happened . On his way off the court, Howard wanted to give away a souvenir. 
Oh, but that souvenir was not going to a Celtics fan. Absolutely not. Dwight you're cold for this. đ pic.twitter.com/lzJGDoMI02 â NBA on ESPN (@ESPNNBA) February 28, 2017 
Howard went full petty mode here, but maybe don't expect a free jersey if you're wearing the opposing team's gear?Â 
Fortunately for the Hawks, Howard's absence didn't hurt them, as Atlanta cruised to a 114-98 win in Boston . Watch This
